title: 21.5" iMac Mid 2010 Backlight problem
message:
Hello Everybody

iMac starting normally with backlight  but  few hours suddenly turn off Lcd backlight (machine is running i can see image at screen) then turn off and on machine continue working backlight. We also changed LCD backlight board but same problem is continue and today tested imac LCD with known good another imac and bam same problem so LCD is faulty its exact..

I changed few capacitors on LCD board but nothing changed.

Do you have any idea about solve this problem by repair LCD panel ?? LM215WF3(SD)(A1)

title: 21.5" iMac Mid 2010 Backlight problem
message: Bad LEDs in LCD. Swap the good glass panel onto one with a cracked one.
